title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 329-2.3 - APGs, Relative Weights, and system updating
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 329-2.3 - APGs, Relative Weights, and system updating

State Regulations

The table of APG Weights, Procedure Based Weights and
units, and APG Fee Schedule Fees and units for each effective period are
published on the New York State Department of Health website at: http://
www.health.state.ny.us/health_care/medicaid/rates/apg/docs/
apg_payment_components.xls
and are herein incorporated by
reference. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
329-2.3

Adopted

New

York State Register December 30, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 52, eff. 12/30/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
